effects.name: Misstep
effects.description: activate the end of turn effect of one enemy of your choice. If no enemies are present, instead draw two dungeon cards.

effects.name: Delayed trap
effects.description: the character in row D receives 1 damage. Draw another dungeon card.

effects.name: Chilly wind
effects.description: Each player discards 1 card from their hands. Draw another dungeon card.

effects.name: The floor is lava
effects.description: by the end of the turn, each character that has not swapped position receives 1 damage.

effects.name: Smoky cloud
effects.description: Players cannot gain actions this turn. Draw another dungeon card.

effects.name: WTF Mirror
effects.description: Both players reveal their hands. Each player decides what cards the other plays this turn. If no enemies are present, draw another dungeon card.

effects.name: Brawl in the family
effects.description: Dungeon cards cannot be targeted this turn. Ignore any dungeon card ongoing or end of turn effects.

effects.name: Sneak in
effects.description: When this card is revealed, players have 20 seconds to say yes or no. If both say yes, they discard 2 cards from their hand. If one says yes and the other says no, they discard 1 card each, then draw 1 dungeon card. If both say no, draw 2 dungeon cards.

effects.name: Falldown
effects.description: Starting player gets it's column A swapped with D, and B with C. If D is dead, then swap A with C and keep B. If B and C are dead, swap A and B. Second player swaps column A with column B.
